languages.text: "Это союз рабочих и техноматов, что трудились в нижних ярусах Сципионы. Мелкие начальники вахт и смен, небесполезные простолюдины, отметившие себя успехами в труде и ценными знаниями. Конечно, они стоят куда ниже почтенных торговцев, не говоря уж об аристократах крови, но... Чернь любит слушать подобных себе, у бригадиров есть авторитет и умение управлять людьми".

"It is a union of workers and technomats who used to serve on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale shift bosses, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."
languages.original_text: "Это союз рабочих и техноматов, что трудились в нижних ярусах Сципионы. Мелкие начальники вахт и смен, небесполезные простолюдины, отметившие себя успехами в труде и ценными знаниями. Конечно, они стоят куда ниже почтенных торговцев, не говоря уж об аристократах крови, но... Чернь любит слушать подобных себе, у бригадиров есть авторитет и умение управлять людьми".

traits.locale_text: "This is a union of the workers and the Technomats who have been working on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who proved their worth with their diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... The common folk like their kin, and the brigadiers have the authority and the ability to manage people."

"This is a union of the workers and the Technomats who have been working on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who proved their worth with their diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... The common folk like their kin, and the brigadiers have the authority and the ability to manage people."

Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed Trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the brigadiers have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed merchants, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

"It is a union of workers and technomats who used to serve on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale shift bosses, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

languages.text: “这群人是由工人和技工组成的工会，之前在希皮奥内巢都底层工作。他们都是些监督轮班的小头领，或是有用的普通人，用勤奋的劳动和宝贵的知识证明了自己的价值。当然，他们的地位比不上尊贵的商人，更遑论与贵族相提并论，不过……普通百姓更擅长留意他们的同类，而领班也有权力和能力管理他们。”
languages.original_text: "It is a union of workers and technomats who used to serve on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale shift bosses, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

traits.locale_text: “这群人是由工人和技工组成的工会，之前在希皮奥内巢都底层工作。他们都是些监督轮班的小头领，或是有用的普通人，用勤奋的劳动和宝贵的知识证明了自己的价值。当然，他们的地位比不上尊贵的商人，更遑论与贵族相提并论，不过……普通百姓更擅长留意他们的同类，而领班也有权力和能力管理他们。”
“这群人是由工人和技工组成的工会，此前一直在希皮奥内巢都底层工作。他们都是些负责监督轮班的小头领，或是有用的普通人，用勤奋的劳动和宝贵的知识证明了自己的价值。当然，他们的地位比不上尊贵的商人，更遑论与贵族相提并论，不过……普通百姓更擅长留意他们的同类，而领班也有权力和能力管理他们。”

languages.text: «Es un sindicato de obreros y tecnómatas que servían en los niveles inferiores de Escipión. Jefes de turno de bajo rango, plebeyos útiles que demostraron su valía con trabajo diligente y conocimiento valioso. Por supuesto, están muy por debajo de los estimados mercaderes, por no hablar de los aristócratas, pero... la gente común hace caso a los suyos, y los capataces tienen tanto la autoridad como la capacidad para dirigirlos».
languages.original_text: "It is a union of workers and technomats who used to serve on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale shift bosses, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

traits.locale_text: «Es un sindicato de obreros y tecnómatas que servían en los niveles inferiores de Escipión. Jefes de turno de bajo rango, plebeyos útiles que demostraron su valía con trabajo diligente y conocimiento valioso. Por supuesto, están muy por debajo de los estimados mercaderes, por no hablar de los aristócratas, pero... la gente común hace caso a los suyos, y los capataces tienen tanto la autoridad como la capacidad para dirigirlos».

languages.text: 「これは、サイピオーネの下層で働く労働者とテクノマットの組合です。監視とシフト管理を行う少数のリーダーたちと、勤勉に働き、貴重な知識でその存在価値を証明してきた役に立つ庶民で構成されています。もちろん、立派なトレーダーよりはるかに低い地位にいる、貴族なら言うまでもないだ...だが、庶民はキンの言うことを聞き入れる、それに准将は彼らを管理する権限も能力も有しています」
languages.original_text: "It is a union of workers and technomats who used to serve on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale shift bosses, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

traits.locale_text: 「これは、サイピオーネの下層で働く労働者とテクノマットの組合です。監視とシフト管理を行う少数のリーダーたちと、勤勉に働き、貴重な知識でその存在価値を証明してきた役に立つ庶民で構成されています。もちろん、立派なトレーダーよりはるかに低い地位にいる、貴族なら言うまでもないだ...だが、庶民はキンの言うことを聞き入れる、それに准将は彼らを管理する権限も能力も有しています」
「これは、サイピオーネの下層で働く労働者とテクノマットの組合です。監視とシフト管理を行う少数のリーダーたちと、勤勉に働き、貴重な知識でその存在価値を証明してきた役に立つ庶民で構成されています。もちろん、立派なトレーダーよりはるかに低い地位にいる、貴族なら言うまでもないだ...だが、庶民はキンの言うことを聞き入れる、それに准将は彼らを管理する権限も能力も有しています」

languages.text: « C'est un syndicat d'ouvriers et de technomates qui servaient dans les niveaux inférieurs de Scipione. Dans l'ensemble, ce sont des responsables, des gens ordinaires ayant prouvé leur valeur en travaillant avec diligence et disposant de précieuses connaissances. Évidemment, ils sont bien plus bas dans l'échelle sociale que les marchands, sans même parler des aristocrates, mais... le petit peuple écoute les siens, et les chefs d'équipe ont sur lui une forme d'autorité qui les rend aptes à le gérer. »
languages.original_text: "It is a union of workers and technomats who used to serve on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale shift bosses, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un syndicat d'ouvriers et de technomates qui servaient dans les niveaux inférieurs de Scipione. Dans l'ensemble, ce sont des responsables, des gens ordinaires ayant prouvé leur valeur en travaillant avec diligence et disposant de précieuses connaissances. Évidemment, ils sont bien plus bas dans l'échelle sociale que les marchands, sans même parler des aristocrates, mais... le petit peuple écoute les siens, et les chefs d'équipe ont sur lui une forme d'autorité qui les rend aptes à le gérer. »

languages.text: "Eine Vereinigung von Arbeitern und Technomaten, die auf den untersten Ebenen von Scipione dienten. Niedere Schichtleiter, nützlicher Pöbel, der seinen Wert durch fleißige Arbeit und wertvolles Wissen bewiesen hat. Natürlich stehen sie deutlich unter den geschätzten Händlern, von den Aristokraten ganz zu schweigen, aber ... der Pöbel hört auf seinesgleichen, und die Vorarbeiter haben wohl die Autorität als auch die Fähigkeit, ihn zu führen."
languages.original_text: "It is a union of workers and technomats who used to serve on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale shift bosses, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Vereinigung von Arbeitern und Technomaten, die auf den untersten Ebenen von Scipione dienten. Niedere Schichtleiter, nützlicher Pöbel, der seinen Wert durch fleißige Arbeit und wertvolles Wissen bewiesen hat. Natürlich stehen sie deutlich unter den geschätzten Händlern, von den Aristokraten ganz zu schweigen, aber ... der Pöbel hört auf seinesgleichen, und die Vorarbeiter haben wohl die Autorität als auch die Fähigkeit, ihn zu führen."

"Das ist eine Vereinigung der Arbeiter und der Technomaten, die auf den untersten Ebenen von Scipione gearbeitet haben. Niedere Aufseher der Wachen und der Schichten, nützlicher Pöbel, der seinen Wert durch fleißige Arbeit und wertvolles Wissen bewiesen hat. Natürlich stehen sie deutlich unter {mf|dem angesehen Freihändler|der angesehenen Freihändlerin}, geschweige denn den Aristokraten, aber ... der Pöbel hört auf seinesgleichen, und die Brigadiere haben wohl die Autorität als auch die Fähigkeit, ihn zu führen."

languages.text: "Scipione'un alt seviyelerinde çalışan işçiler ile teknomatların dâhil olduğu bir sendika. Vardiya şefleri; özenli çalışmaları ve kıymetli irfanları ile değerlerini kanıtlayan, oldukça faydalı vatandaşlar. Elbette muhterem tüccarlardan bir hayli aşağı seviyedeler. Hele ki aristokratlarla karşılaştırırsak... Ancak sıradan halk, kendi soydaşını arar. Ustabaşının ise hem otoritesi hem de sıradan halkı yönlendirme kabiliyeti mevcuttur."
languages.original_text: "It is a union of workers and technomats who used to serve on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale shift bosses, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they rank much lower than the esteemed merchants, to say nothing of the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

Hele ki aristokratlarla karşılaştırırsak... Ancak sıradan halk, kendi soydaşını arar. Ustabaşının ise hem otoritesi hem de sıradan halkı yönlendirme kabiliyeti mevcuttur."
